title: Survey for Support Tickets
body:
Here is a copy paste for what every survey for support tickets is Riot, you don't need to keep asking these questions.

http://image.prntscr.com/image/888e5302e47140e5828df114d3116a18.png

Your team never looks to understand what the request is, just checks for keywords and then copy paste's a result for you.

The knowledge of the member never matters, because they are never actually typing a word.

There is NEVER a non-copy pasted response before 3 tickets in, and you damn well know it.

And because of this, unless the support ticket needs a copy+pasted answer, your damn well not getting it solved any time soon.

So quit bothering with these surveys when these questions clearly convey the fact that you damn well know every response is essentially automated.

replies.body:
Do you mind sharing the question you asked and Riot Support's response to it?

+ From personal experience Riot Support has only 'copied and pasted' me when I didn't go through [troubleshooting articles](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664), or my question had already been answered in a [FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/230175788-Updated-Client-Open-Beta-FAQ).

 But that's just my personal experience, and I have heard of some players getting copy-paste answers in legitimate situations too. Although I also think some players struggle differentiating very formal responses from a copy-paste. For example [this guy](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behaviour/7bM8XRPq-does-riot-never-fix-their-bugs?comment=000100000000). 

If Riot really did just slap a copy-paste on you for a legitimate question, then calling them out here is a good idea. The 'naming and shaming' rules don't apply for un-satisfactory Riot Support service :D

That guys thing that you linked, is clearly a 2nd-3rd response.

I put in reports constantly, and am constantly given copy paste answers, some that are even irrelevant to the question i have asked, simply cause i have hit a key word early.

Yes, but he said he _"never"_ got an actual response. Yet it's pretty clear that the message he received was in fact a handwritten response and a not copy-paste, but it seems he couldn't tell the difference.

Either way, what you're saying sounds pretty bad :( I've never heard of someone getting an irrelevant copy-paste. I'd be happy to bring it up with some of my Riot Support contacts for you if you want though. I just need the [ticket ID](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests) to send them.
